entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low plus 4 with temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low plus 4 with temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 80 in the morning. High 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
